title: Iain Stewart – 2021 Comments on the 2025 City of Culture Bidding Process
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Iain Stewart, the UK Government Minister for Scotland, on 29 May 2021.
content:
The UK City of Culture competition offers a wonderful opportunity for the winning city to make its mark on the UK’s cultural landscape.
